title: Implement SeCe-IT offer documents into IRRP-eMails for EOS
description:
Description
Process information:
Requirements:
O3 loads the SeCe-IT offer document from SeCe-IT in order to attach it as link to a file (PDF, etc.) to the IRRP email (similar to the implementation at Flamingo)
details tbd

Prerequisites
Requires Sece-IT interface specification (yaml)
Requires running document API on Sece-IT
Requires joint test phase with Sece-IT
acceptance_criteria: user stories implemented, tested and accepted in CIT2
solution is deployed with feature toggle (header flag processing engine "remote") in PROD
